channel.title: Free Video Editing
channel.description:
Hey guys, I would like to help people out by editing there video. I do really enjoy it, I dont got any projects atm, so if you want me to edit your video, then hit me up!
Could be; RS related stoof, School or anything else!
I actually got no idea where to post this so that's why im posting it here :P
Previous work (nothing specials at all):
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FLzUfqjgSK8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n5_sWVhbxWE

item.title: Free Video Editing
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:13, topic:535871”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=654676.msg4385773#msg4385773 date=1385486500]

You’re using movie maker?

Cinema4D, Sony vegas nd AE Cs6

but for the soccer movie only sony vegas because I had to do it fast.

I wouldn’t bother using Cinema 4D.

I personally use after affects to edit the clips and then throw it together in vegas (would use vegas for other things too like alpha channels etc).

But my computer does not support the newer software
[/quote]
Cinema4D is for the 3D Motion Tracks[/quote]
As far as I know, Cinema 4D doesn’t motion track. It is used for 3D work though.

Read full topic

Cinema4D, Sony vegas nd AE Cs6

but for the soccer movie only sony vegas because I had to do it fast.
[/quote]
I wouldn’t bother using Cinema 4D.

I personally use after affects to edit the clips and then throw it together in vegas (would use vegas for other things too like alpha channels etc).

But my computer does not support the newer software :([/quote]
Cinema4D is for the 3D Motion Tracks

item.title: Free Video Editing
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:11, topic:535871”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=654676.msg4385435#msg4385435 date=1385293575]
You’re using movie maker?
[/quote]

Cinema4D, Sony vegas nd AE Cs6

but for the soccer movie only sony vegas because I had to do it fast.[/quote]
I wouldn’t bother using Cinema 4D.

I personally use after affects to edit the clips and then throw it together in vegas (would use vegas for other things too like alpha channels etc).

But my computer does not support the newer software

item.title: Free Video Editing
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:535871”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=654676.msg4385148#msg4385148 date=1385123985]
No don’t. We really do praise helping out in the community, at least I think we do. It’s just some people here are a bit critical about a lot of things

I myself did a small project that was similar at the start of the year, I’ll post a link below.
http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=495008090536149&l=1342425531877127146
[/quote]
I agree, you should keep helping if you’re willing to do so. But I was just saying that if you want people to come to you, you want to post better work. No offence but it doesn’t look like people like the work you did do on that video.[/quote]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FLzUfqjgSK8
Is this any better? it ain’t good at all

Read full topic

item.title: Free Video Editing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:7, topic:535871”]No don’t. We really do praise helping out in the community, at least I think we do. It’s just some people here are a bit critical about a lot of things

I myself did a small project that was similar at the start of the year, I’ll post a link below.
http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=495008090536149&l=1342425531877127146[/quote]
I agree, you should keep helping if you’re willing to do so. But I was just saying that if you want people to come to you, you want to post better work. No offence but it doesn’t look like people like the work you did do on that video.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Video Editing
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Les Friction is overused. Wouldn’t have been a good choice of song use at the skill level you are. Try finding something that is easily syncable and fits the theme for soccer.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Video Editing
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

That video spends way too much time with a black screen, “you can do this” or a countdown. I’d suggest making the video more fast paced or add more clips into it.

Read full topic
